author: palladia

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Just for future reference, both bots build branches as well, so PRs aren't necessary to get builds :smile:

comments.author: palladia
comments.body: How do I start CI builds, beside PR's?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Push a branch and check its build (under branches).
On Feb 9, 2016 9:11 AM, "George Fleming" notifications@github.com wrote:

> How do I start CI builds, beside PR's?
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/517#issuecomment-181961361
> .

title: pull in src/monad to kick start CI
